content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position: 16.0, 71.0)
- Stone furnace (position: 17.0, 74.0)
- Burner inserter (position: 19.5, 71.5) that inputs iron ore into furnace
- Burner inserter (position: 17.5, 75.5) that outputs iron plates from furnace
- Belt group (positions: 16.5, 72.5 to 20.5, 71.5) that connects the burner mining drill to the burner inserter

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure you are within a reasonable distance (max distance is 10) from the target position before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
- Check if the target position is occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.

### Errors when connecting entities directly
- Use an inserter as an intermediary when connecting transport belts to entities like furnaces.

### Errors when placing entities with incorrect direction or spacing
- Adjust the direction or spacing when placing entities to avoid collisions with existing entities.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
